name: Echoic Recall
description:
Walk a few steps in the shoes of someone with severe short term memory loss.

Will you walk out the door with a wonder of who you are, or find a way to remember your true being?

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys
  • Enter, e, or spacebar to interact
  • Esc to open up the sound volume controls

Credits

  • All visual assets created by TheDuckCow
  • All music recording created by TheDuckCow, song is an abbreviated piano cover of Glass Animal's "It's All So Incredibly Loud"
  • Sound effects from freesounds.org:
    • Page turn
    • Squeak toy
    • Pour water
    • Key jingling
